code: import React from'react';import Card from'../components/Card';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HomeScreen(props){var bookmarks=props.bookmarks;var placeholderBookmark={_id:1,title:"Your first Dogear!",image:'/images/distorted2.png',description:'Click the plus button above to add your own dogeared pages.',tags:'#my #first #dogear',url:'localhost:3000'};if(bookmarks.length>0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cards",children:bookmarks.map(function(bookmark){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{bookmark:bookmark},bookmark._id);})});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{bookmark:placeholderBookmark});}}export default HomeScreen;
